cause.description:
1. Social and economic development is not possible without the meaningful and sustained involvement of the people who are most affected.
2. Media is one of the most powerful influences in our world today. Effective community media encourages dialogue and enables everyone to be recipients a
3. Access to information and education is a basic human right
cause.mission: To create positive social change for millions of underserved people in the developing world by providing critically needed information and education.
cause.name: Equal Access International
